title: ZeroDivisionError in graspologic.layouts.nooverlap
body:
## Expected Behavior
Graph layout succeeds

## Actual Behavior
ZeroDivisionError during no overlap phase

## Example Code
```
python -m graspologic.layouts --verbose True n2vumap --edge_list edgelist.csv --image_file render.png --location_file locations.csv --skip_header
```

## Full Traceback
```pytb
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/oregon/projector-docker/pythons/3.7.10/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", mod_spec)
  File "/home/oregon/projector-docker/pythons/3.7.10/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/__main__.py", line 316, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/__main__.py", line 312, in main
    args.func(args)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/__main__.py", line 71, in _umap
    graph, positions = auto.layout_umap(graph, max_edges=arguments.max_edges)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/auto.py", line 179, in layout_umap
    positions = _node_positions_from(lcc_graph, labels, points, random_seed=random_seed)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/auto.py", line 253, in _node_positions_from
    positions = remove_overlaps(positions)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/nooverlap/nooverlap.py", line 23, in remove_overlaps
    qt.layout_dense_first(first_color=None)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/nooverlap/_quad_tree.py", line 65, in layout_dense_first
    qn.layout_quad()
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/nooverlap/_quad_node.py", line 635, in layout_quad
    self._do_contraction_with_given_nodes(root.nodes)
  File "/home/oregon/env3.7.10/lib/python3.7/site-packages/graspologic/layouts/nooverlap/_quad_node.py", line 1039, in _do_contraction_with_given_nodes
    len_c_new * math.sin(math.radians(angle_b_new)) / math.sin(angle_c)
ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero
```

## Your Environment
* Python version: 3.7.10
* graspologic version: 0.1.0

## Additional Details
Any other contextual information you might feel is important.
